section.text: *NOTE: This section was repealed by temporary legislation that will expire on July 10, 2024. To view the text of this section after the expiration of all emergency and temporary legislation, click this link: Permanent Version.*
section.heading: Certification of COVID-19 immunization.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 2(c) of Coronavirus Immunization of School Students and Early Childhood Workers Regulation Emergency Amendment Act of 2021 (D.C. Act 24-280, Jan. 12, 2022, 69 DCR 000425).
For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 2 of Coronavirus Immunization of School Students Emergency Amendment Act of 2022 (D.C. Act 24-669, Nov. 22, 2022, 0 DCR 0).
For temporary (225 days) amendment of this section, see § 2 of Coronavirus Immunization of School Students Temporary Amendment Act of 2022 (D.C. Law 24-274, Feb. 23, 2023, 69 DCR 15080).

For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 2 of Coronavirus Immunization of School Students Congressional Review Emergency Amendment Act of 2023 (D.C. Act 25-30, Feb. 24, 2023, 70 DCR 2965).
For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 2(b) of School Student Vaccination Emergency Amendment Act of 2023 (D.C. Act 25-200, July 31, 2023, 70 DCR 10752).
For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 2(b) of School Student Vaccination Congressional Review Emergency Amendment Act of 2023 (D.C. Act 25-258, Oct. 25, 2023, 70 DCR 14430).
For temporary (225 days) amendment of this section, see § 2(b) of School Student Vaccination Temporary Amendment Act of 2023 (D.C. Law 25-77, Nov. 28, 2023, 70 DCR 13748).
